com.brightcove.commons.collection
Class CollectionUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.brightcove.commons.collection.CollectionUtils

public class CollectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This is a fairly simple set of static methods to perform operations on Collection objects (Lists, Arrays, Vectors, Sets, etc).

Author:
three4clavin

Method Detail

JoinToString

public static <T> java.lang.String JoinToString(T[] array,
                                                java.lang.String delimiter)

Given an object static array and a delimiter, creates a delimited string of the objects in the array (using the toString() method of each object).

Null objects will be printed out as an empty string

Parameters:
array - Static array of objects
delimiter - Delimiter to separate the objects in the output String
Returns:
Delimited String of the objects in the array

JoinToString

public static <T> java.lang.String JoinToString(T[] array,
                                                java.lang.String delimiter,
                                                java.lang.Boolean escapeDelimiter,
                                                java.lang.String escapeSequence)

Given an object static array and a delimiter, creates a delimited string of the objects in the array (using the toString() method of each object).

Null objects will be printed out as an empty string

Parameters:
array - Static array of objects
delimiter - Delimiter to separate the objects in the output String
escapeDelimiter - If true, delimiters in the original strings will be escaped with escapeSequence
escapeSequence - String to escape delimiters with
Returns:
Delimited String of the objects in the array

JoinToString

public static java.lang.String JoinToString(java.lang.Iterable<?> list,
                                            java.lang.String delimiter)

Given a iterable object (list, set, etc) and a delimiter, creates a delimited string of the objects in the List (using the toString() method of each object).

Null objects will be printed out as an empty string

Parameters:
list - Iterable object (Set, List, etc) of objects
delimiter - Delimiter to separate the objects in the output String
Returns:
Delimited String of the objects in the List

JoinToString

public static java.lang.String JoinToString(java.lang.Iterable<?> list,
                                            java.lang.String delimiter,
                                            java.lang.Boolean escapeDelimiter,
                                            java.lang.String escapeSequence)

Given a iterable object (list, set, etc) and a delimiter, creates a delimited string of the objects in the List (using the toString() method of each object).

Null objects will be printed out as an empty string

Parameters:
list - Iterable object (Set, List, etc) of objects
delimiter - Delimiter to separate the objects in the output String
escapeDelimiter - If true, delimiters in the original strings will be escaped with escapeSequence
escapeSequence - String to escape delimiters with
Returns:
Delimited String of the objects in the List
